resources.string: The Call of Duty franchise is no stranger to mobile gaming, but the succinctly titled Call of Duty: Mobile is different. While many have already fought Call of Duty zombies on a phone and even used a Nintendo DS stylus to aim down sights in unambitious games designed for the limitations of their platforms, this new entry represents a concerted effort from Activision to make a mark on the notoriously difficult-to-crack and overcrowded mobile market â€“n
